MultiFeature.Name: Psionic Restoration
MultiFeature.Text: You wield psionic energy to cure wounds and restore health to yourself and others.

Feature.Name: Psionic Restoration - Psychic Focus
Feature.Text: While focused on this discipline, you can use a bonus action to touch a living creature that has 0 hit points and automatically stabilize it.

Feature.Name: Psionic Restoration - Mend Wounds (1â€“7)
Feature.Text: As an action, you can restore hit points to a creature you touch. The creature regains 3 hit points per psi point you spend.

Feature.Name: Psionic Restoration - Restore Health (3)
Feature.Text: As an action, you can touch a creature and remove one of the following conditions from it: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

Feature.Name: Psionic Restoration - Restore Vigor (7)
Feature.Text: As an action, you can touch a creature and choose one of the following: remove any reductions to one of its ability scores or remove one effect that reduces its hit point maximum.
